title: How to Navigate Online Classes | Wellness Center | University of Illinois at Chicago
text: Due to the rapid change of switching from regular in-person to online classes, we wanted to put together helpful tips to navigate e-classes! A majority of you are dipping your toes into a new world that you may not be used to, so we want to share with you tips and resources on how to finish your semester strong!
To help you during these stressful times, we did the research for you, so you don’t have to!

Before we go into the tips, we want to remind notify you of UIC’s Spring 2020 Undergraduate Grading Policy, which was sent in an email yesterday(03/29).  Take a look at the link here: https://today.uic.edu/undergraduate-grading-policy-for-spring-2020-semester.
